text: The Finnish Cup (; ) is Finland's main national cup competition in football. This yearly competition is open for all member clubs of the FA of Finland and has been played since 1955. Finnish Cup winner qualifies to UEFA Europa League. ==Finals== Final attendances between 1955-2008 The performance of various clubs is shown in the following table:
